Description:
Landmark warehouse living with city-view rooftop terrace
Magnificent polished timber ceilings soar 8.5 metres above the light and airy living spaces of this expansive, 4 bedroom residence rising with captivating effect to an amazing city-view rooftop terrace. Distinctive and dramatic displaying all of the iconic character of its Foy & Gibson heritage (1900), this stunning conversion curated over 3 levels layered with an endless list of superlatives presents a remarkably rare lifestyle experience in Melbourne's most sought-after warehouse apartment precinct. Visionary in its outlook, brilliant in its execution; the beauty of this unique city-edge opportunity is not only its historic aesthetics and modern style, but its extraordinary space and versatility offering in excess of 38 squares of light-filled luxury. Under the artisan-crafted, oregon beam ceiling is an impressive open-plan living and dining zone (HeatnGlo gas fireplace, entertainment unit) complemented by a relaxing library, cafe/bar (dual fridges) and spacious separate office/4th bedroom plus a top-floor lantern lounge/retreat opening to the sun-drenched alfresco terrace. A superb exemplar of warehouse living with its big open spaces and spectacular lofty heights, this beautifully finished home features main bedroom with WIR and double-shower bathroom, Miele-appointed kitchen with stainless-steel and timber benchtops, sophisticated contemporary bath and powder rooms, large fitted laundry, cellar/storage, hydronic heating, split-system air-conditioning, alarm, intercom, zoned speaker system, automatic retractable awnings, original Baltic pine floors, wool carpets and storage cupboard plus 2 car spaces on title. Centrally located in the heart of Collingwood near all that makes inner-city living so exciting; walk to an endless selection of excellent restaurants, cafes, shops and trams on nearby Smith/Gertrude/Brunswick Streets, elegant parks and gardens, city-fringe hospitals, Melbourne's sports' precinct and the city.
